languages.text: "Восстановим порядок и выявим гниль у власти за раз".

traits.locale_text: "Восстановим порядок и выявим гниль у власти за раз".

languages.text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."
languages.original_text: "Восстановим порядок и выявим гниль у власти за раз".

traits.locale_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."
"We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."
"We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."
"We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."
"We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

languages.text: "Düzeni yeniden sağlayacak ve yozlaşmış yetkilileri tek bir hamlede ifşa edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: "Düzeni yeniden sağlayacak ve yozlaşmış yetkilileri tek bir hamlede ifşa edeceğiz."

languages.text: « Nous allons faire d'une pierre deux coups en rétablissant l'ordre et en exposant les autorités corrompues. »
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons faire d'une pierre deux coups en rétablissant l'ordre et en exposant les autorités corrompues. »

languages.text: 「我々は一挙に秩序を回復し、腐敗した当局を暴き出します」
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は一挙に秩序を回復し、腐敗した当局を暴き出します」

languages.text: “我们必将恢复秩序，一举消灭那些腐败分子。”
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: “我们必将恢复秩序，一举消灭那些腐败分子。”

languages.text: «Restauraremos el orden y expondremos a los corruptos al mismo tiempo».
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: «Restauraremos el orden y expondremos a los corruptos al mismo tiempo».

languages.text: "Wir werden die Ordnung wiederherstellen und die korrupten Behören mit einem einzigen Schlag bloßstellen."
languages.original_text: "We will restore order and expose the corrupt authorities at a single stroke."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden die Ordnung wiederherstellen und die korrupten Behören mit einem einzigen Schlag bloßstellen."
